<S>1161</S> There was<S>2258</S> a man<S>444</S> of<S>1537</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, named<S>3686</S> <S>846</S> Nicodemus<S>3530</S>, a ruler<S>758</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>:
The same<S>3778</S> came<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> by night<S>3571</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rabbi<S>4461</S>, we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> thou art<S>2064</S> a teacher<S>1320</S> come<S>2064</S> from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>: for<S>1063</S> no man<S>3762</S> can<S>1410</S> do<S>4160</S> these<S>5023</S> miracles<S>4592</S> that<S>3739</S> thou<S>4771</S> doest<S>4160</S>, except<S>3362</S> God<S>2316</S> be<S>5600</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Except<S>3362</S> a man<S>5100</S> be born<S>1080</S> again<S>509</S>, he cannot<S>1410</S> <S>3756</S> see<S>1492</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>. <sup>again: or, from above</sup>
Nicodemus<S>3530</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, How<S>4459</S> can<S>1410</S> a man<S>444</S> be born<S>1080</S> when he is<S>5607</S> old<S>1088</S>? can<S>3361</S> <S>1410</S> he enter<S>1525</S> the second time<S>1208</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> mother's<S>3384</S> womb<S>2836</S>, and<S>2532</S> be born<S>1080</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Except<S>3362</S> a man<S>5100</S> be born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> water<S>5204</S> and<S>2532</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S>, he cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
That which is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> the flesh<S>4561</S> is<S>2076</S> flesh<S>4561</S>; and<S>2532</S> that which is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> is<S>2076</S> spirit<S>4151</S>.
Marvel<S>2296</S> not<S>3361</S> that<S>3754</S> I said<S>2036</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Ye<S>5209</S> must<S>1163</S> be born<S>1080</S> again<S>509</S>. <sup>again: or, from above</sup>
The wind<S>4151</S> bloweth<S>4154</S> where<S>3699</S> it listeth<S>2309</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou hearest<S>191</S> the sound<S>5456</S> thereof<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> canst<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S> whence<S>4159</S> it cometh<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> whither<S>4226</S> it goeth<S>5217</S>: so<S>3779</S> is<S>2076</S> every one<S>3956</S> that is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S>.
Nicodemus<S>3530</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, How<S>4459</S> can<S>1410</S> these things<S>5023</S> be<S>1096</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> a master<S>1320</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, and<S>2532</S> knowest<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> these things<S>5023</S>?
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, We speak<S>2980</S> that<S>3754</S> <S>3739</S> we do know<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> testify<S>3140</S> that<S>3739</S> we have seen<S>3708</S>; and<S>2532</S> ye receive<S>2983</S> not<S>3756</S> our<S>2257</S> witness<S>3141</S>.
If<S>1487</S> I have told<S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S> earthly things<S>1919</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S>, how<S>4459</S> shall ye believe<S>4100</S>, if<S>1437</S> I tell<S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S> of heavenly things<S>2032</S>?
And<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> hath ascended up<S>305</S> to<S>1519</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, but<S>1508</S> he that came down<S>2597</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, even the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> Moses<S>3475</S> lifted up<S>5312</S> the serpent<S>3789</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, even so<S>3779</S> must<S>1163</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> be lifted up<S>5312</S>:
That<S>3363</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> believeth<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> should<S>622</S> not<S>3363</S> perish<S>622</S>, but<S>235</S> have<S>2192</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> so<S>3779</S> loved<S>25</S> the world<S>2889</S>, that<S>5620</S> he gave<S>1325</S> his<S>846</S> only begotten<S>3439</S> Son<S>5207</S>, that<S>2443</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> believeth<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> should<S>622</S> not<S>3361</S> perish<S>622</S>, but<S>235</S> have<S>2192</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> sent<S>649</S> not<S>3756</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S> to<S>2443</S> condemn<S>2919</S> the world<S>2889</S>; but<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> the world<S>2889</S> through<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> might be saved<S>4982</S>.
He that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> is<S>2919</S> not<S>3756</S> condemned<S>2919</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that believeth<S>4100</S> not<S>3361</S> is condemned<S>2919</S> already<S>2235</S>, because<S>3754</S> he hath<S>4100</S> not<S>3361</S> believed<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the only begotten<S>3439</S> Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the condemnation<S>2920</S>, that<S>3754</S> light<S>5457</S> is come<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> men<S>444</S> loved<S>25</S> darkness<S>4655</S> rather<S>3123</S> than<S>2228</S> light<S>5457</S>, because<S>1063</S> their<S>846</S> deeds<S>2041</S> were<S>2258</S> evil<S>4190</S>.
For<S>1063</S> every one<S>3956</S> that doeth<S>4238</S> evil<S>5337</S> hateth<S>3404</S> the light<S>5457</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> cometh<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> the light<S>5457</S>, lest<S>3363</S> his<S>846</S> deeds<S>2041</S> should be reproved<S>1651</S>. <sup>reproved: or, discovered</sup>
But<S>1161</S> he that doeth<S>4160</S> truth<S>225</S> cometh<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> the light<S>5457</S>, that<S>2443</S> his<S>846</S> deeds<S>2041</S> may be made manifest<S>5319</S>, that<S>3754</S> they are<S>2076</S> wrought<S>2038</S> in<S>1722</S> God<S>2316</S>.
After<S>3326</S> these things<S>5023</S> came<S>2064</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> into<S>1519</S> the land<S>1093</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>; and<S>2532</S> there<S>1563</S> he tarried<S>1304</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> baptized<S>907</S>.
And<S>1161</S> John<S>2491</S> also<S>2532</S> was<S>2258</S> baptizing<S>907</S> in<S>1722</S> Aenon<S>137</S> near<S>1451</S> to Salim<S>4530</S>, because<S>3754</S> there was<S>2258</S> much<S>4183</S> water<S>5204</S> there<S>1563</S>: and<S>2532</S> they came<S>3854</S>, and<S>2532</S> were baptized<S>907</S>.
For<S>1063</S> John<S>2491</S> was<S>2258</S> not yet<S>3768</S> cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> prison<S>5438</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> there arose<S>1096</S> a question<S>2214</S> between<S>3326</S> some of<S>1537</S> John's<S>2491</S> disciples<S>3101</S> and the Jews<S>2453</S> about<S>4012</S> purifying<S>2512</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they came<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> John<S>2491</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rabbi<S>4461</S>, he<S>3739</S> that was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> thee<S>4675</S> beyond<S>4008</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>, to whom<S>3739</S> thou<S>4771</S> barest witness<S>3140</S>, behold<S>2396</S>, the same<S>3778</S> baptizeth<S>907</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> men come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>.
John<S>2491</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, A man<S>444</S> can<S>1410</S> <S>3756</S> receive<S>2983</S> nothing<S>3762</S>, except<S>3362</S> it be<S>5600</S> given<S>1325</S> him<S>846</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>. <sup>receive: or, take unto himself</sup>
Ye<S>5210</S> yourselves<S>846</S> bear<S>3140</S> me<S>3427</S> witness<S>3140</S>, that<S>3754</S> I said<S>2036</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>, but<S>235</S> that<S>3754</S> I am<S>1510</S> sent<S>649</S> before<S>1715</S> him<S>1565</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> the bride<S>3565</S> is<S>2076</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S>: but<S>1161</S> the friend<S>5384</S> of the bridegroom<S>3566</S>, which<S>3588</S> standeth<S>2476</S> and<S>2532</S> heareth<S>191</S> him<S>846</S>, rejoiceth<S>5463</S> greatly<S>5479</S> because<S>1223</S> of the bridegroom's<S>3566</S> voice<S>5456</S>: this<S>3778</S> my<S>1699</S> joy<S>5479</S> therefore<S>3767</S> is fulfilled<S>4137</S>.
He<S>1565</S> must<S>1163</S> increase<S>837</S>, but<S>1161</S> I<S>1691</S> must decrease<S>1642</S>.
He that cometh<S>2064</S> from above<S>509</S> is<S>2076</S> above<S>1883</S> all<S>3956</S>: he that is<S>5607</S> of<S>1537</S> the earth<S>1093</S> is<S>2076</S> earthly<S>1537</S> <S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> speaketh<S>2980</S> of<S>1537</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: he that cometh<S>2064</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> above<S>1883</S> all<S>3956</S>.
And<S>2532</S> what<S>3739</S> he hath seen<S>3708</S> and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S>, that<S>5124</S> he testifieth<S>3140</S>; and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> his<S>846</S> testimony<S>3141</S>.
He that hath received<S>2983</S> his<S>846</S> testimony<S>3141</S> hath set to his seal<S>4972</S> that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he whom<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath sent<S>649</S> speaketh<S>2980</S> the words<S>4487</S> of God<S>2316</S>: for<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> giveth<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> by<S>1537</S> measure<S>3358</S> unto him.
The Father<S>3962</S> loveth<S>25</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath given<S>1325</S> all things<S>3956</S> into<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
He that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> the Son<S>5207</S> hath<S>2192</S> everlasting<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>: and<S>1161</S> he that believeth not<S>544</S> the Son<S>5207</S> shall<S>3700</S> not<S>3756</S> see<S>3700</S> life<S>2222</S>; but<S>235</S> the wrath<S>3709</S> of God<S>2316</S> abideth<S>3306</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
